description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Boy's Percy, being old ballads of war, adventure and love, from Bishop Thomas Percy's Reliques of Ancient English Poetry, together with an appendix containing two ballads from the original Percy Folio MS. Edited, ... with an introduction, by S. Lanier ... With fifty illustrations from original designs, by E. B. Bensell" Author: PERCY, Thomas - Bishop of Dromore Contributor: BENSELL, Edmund Birckhead. Contributor: LANIER, Sidney Clopton. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11622.e.11." Page: 41 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: Sampson Low & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002819817 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
